00020 #ifndef SIMPLEADDRESS_H
00021 #define SIMPLEADDRESS_H
00022 
00023 #include <omnetpp.h>
00024 
00025 #ifdef MIXIM_INET
00026 #include <MACAddress.h>
00027 #endif
00028 
00029 #include "MiXiMDefs.h"
00030 
00040 class MIXIM_API LAddress {
00041 public:
00047 #ifdef MIXIM_INET
00048     typedef MACAddress L2Type;
00049 #else
00050     typedef long L2Type;
00051 #endif
00052 
00057     typedef long L3Type;
00058 
00060     static const L2Type L2BROADCAST;
00062     static const L2Type L2NULL;
00064     static const L3Type L3BROADCAST;
00066     static const L3Type L3NULL;
00067 public:
00074     static inline bool isL2Broadcast(const L2Type& pSrcAddr) {
00075 #ifdef MIXIM_INET
00076         return pSrcAddr.isBroadcast();
00077 #else
00078         return pSrcAddr == L2BROADCAST;
00079 #endif
00080     }
00087     static inline bool isL3Broadcast(const L3Type& pSrcAddr) {
00088         return pSrcAddr == L3BROADCAST;
00089     }
00090 };
00091 
00092 #endif
